name: Seeker (itch) (Timothy A. Chatman)
description:
The spirit of a traitor or the betrayed? Why does it matter in the end? On this land you took your final breaths, and you have lost much of yourself. With the guidance of the gods you seek to repent your sins.

Credits: 

Developer: 

Timothy A. Chatman
